details.msg: [LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='The graph.py file uses direct function parameters instead of Runtime[Context] pattern, breaking the established architecture and making context access inconsistent', severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Missing separate prompt for LLM-based categorization in prompts.py - categorization is hardcoded in tools instead of using LLM intelligence', severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Complex graph flow with multiple routing functions and additional state management increases unnecessary complexity compared to the simpler expert implementation', severity='minor')]
User id and category wise storage is present
LLM based categorization is not present
